items.label: [Table Connection] — Verify Patch cables under tabletop are connected to matching cables for away and home sides of the table
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Patch POrt 1 -> Panel Port 1 above switch
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Connect long black cable labeld 'Switch-Away' to patch port 1 (left end of table)
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Run cable under bench seats
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Place Netgear on floor under bench
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Connect 3 blue Ethernet cables to Netgear
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection] — Verify connectivity: Away Bench IP - 172.32.x.x
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Event's VLAN) || Away Phone] — Port 2 -> Patch to Panel Port 2 above switch
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Event's VLAN) || Away Phone] — Connect visitor phone (check label under phone) using blue ethernet cable
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Event's VLAN) || Away Phone] — Place phone at end of table near away bench
[Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Event's VLAN) || Away Phone] — Attatch Referee replay monitor to the monitor mount on table
[Switch Configuration || Ports 3-10 (NBA VLAN) || Tissot] — Port 3 -> Patch panel por 20 (find labeled ethernet cord
[Switch Configuration || Ports 3-10 (NBA VLAN) || Tracey's Laptop] — Port 4 --> Direct connect using labled cord
[Switch Configuration || Ports 3-10 (NBA VLAN) || Tracey's Laptop] — Connect laptop to UPS -> UPS to table outlet
[Switch Configuration || Ports 3-10 (NBA VLAN) || Tracey's Laptop] — Launch site: 10.111.24.29
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Sound Meter] — Port 11 -> Direct connect
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Sound Meter] — Unpack mic & cover, route under table, place in front of switch
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Sound Meter] — Connect with Labled ethernet cord
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Sound Meter] — Plug in power cord to table outlet
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Phone] — Port 12 -> Direct Connect Statistician phone (look for labeled ethernet cord) and place to the left of the monitor
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Phone] — Port 13 -> Patch panel D020: Security phone (look for labeled ethernet cord) and place to the right of the monitor
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Phone] — Port 14 -> Patch panel D021: Tracey's phone (look for labeled ethernet cord)
[Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Phone] — Port 15 -> Patch panel D023: Tracey's phone light (look for labeled ethernet cord)
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — Port 21 -> Patch panel D024
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — Connect long black ethernet cabled labeled 'Switch-Home' to patch port 24 on right side of table
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — run cable underneath bench seats, pushing down to avoid tripping hazard at seat gap
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — Place Netgear switch on floor under second row bench and run cable through cable trough
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — Connect 3 grey ethernet cables to Netgear
[Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench] — Verify connectivity: Home Bench IP - 172.32.x.x
[Switch Configuration || Ports 23-24 || Trunk Ports] — Connect long orange labeled ethernet cord from 'dasher wall NBA port (D003)' -> under floor cover -> to port 24 on front table switch
[Switch Configuration || NBA Equipment] — Place Precisicion Time to right of the Tissot machine
[Switch Configuration || NBA Equipment] — Connect Precision Time via Ethernet to Port 5 on switch
[Switch Configuration || NBA Equipment] — Connect brown VGA cable from the back of Precision time to the back of the Tissot machine
[Switch Configuration || NBA Equipment] — Connect Precision Time USB cable to back of precision time, run underneath table and connect to dasher wall port labeled 'PTS'
[BREAKDOWN CHECKLIST] — Power off al devices
[BREAKDOWN CHECKLIST] — Disconnect and coil all cabeles
[BREAKDOWN CHECKLIST] — Return all items to labeled crates and cart in DVOM Closet
[BREAKDOWN CHECKLIST] — Confirm all cables and equipment are labeled and secured

West Club | Section 104, 105, 106, 108
